title: Trump Organization Must Hand Over Documents by Next Month, Judge Rules
sub_head: New York attorney general had sought documents more than two years ago for civil-fraud investigation
body:
A New York judge ruled Monday that the Trump Organization must soon hand over outstanding materials that state Attorney General Letitia James subpoenaed for her civil-fraud investigation of the company and former President Donald Trump.
“I hope we are winding down this whole investigation,” New York State Supreme Court Justice Arthur Engoron said during a court hearing Monday. “One thing all of us can agree on is we want this to end at some point.”
